# The `ARMCallLowering.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file implements the lowering of LLVM calls to machine code calls for GlobalISel. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cannot create a truncating copy, nor a trunc of a physical register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Therefore, we need to copy the content of the physical register into a</span></CodeLine>
